Kup/nightlight/Windlord:

Kup reicved the signal of the cr and said "Nightlight and Windlord has been 
repaired... It's time for them to be reporgramed; Nightsight, Straigth Shot 
and Talon, I need a hand, the rest, please, stay here and told us what is 
goin on"

Kup walked towards the Cr where Nightlight and Windlord remained unconseus, 
the stasis handcuffs had prevented them to woke up. Kup walked towards the 
CRs and watched them looking with sadness his friends

> *     *     *     *     *
>
> Meanwhile, next door to the medbay in the recharge chambers there were
> twin beeps as both Windlord and the female once known as Nightlight
> are fully charged and repaired. With a click and a hiss the doors
> began to slide open.
>
> (TAG)
>
> Preston
